metadata.Title: CVE-2017-20004 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: In the standard library in Rust before 1.19.0, there is a synchronization problem in the MutexGuard object. MutexGuards can be used across threads with any types, allowing for memory safety issues through race conditions.

criterions.comment: rustc: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
